scripts.deploy: docker build -t azinformatica/$npm_package_name:$npm_package_version . && docker tag azinformatica/$npm_package_name:$npm_package_version azinformatica/$npm_package_name:latest && docker push azinformatica/$npm_package_name:$npm_package_version && docker push azinformatica/$npm_package_name:latest
